reviews.review_msg: He expects you to read A LOT (not specifically courseware), and looks down at you when you don't read. He is rude to his students, says our writing is sh!t because we don't read but doesn't explain himself. Lectures long and boring, and talks sh!t about other professors. Only took it cause it was 6 credits

Scott was definitely very intimidating at first. His lectures are hard to follow, mainly because of his accent and language. But once you talk to him in person, you start to understand exactly what he's looking for, and how you can excel in his class. Highly recommend for people who are looking to LEARN.
